thread.title: Tokyo Seeks Talks With North Korea Amid Concern About Japanese Abductees

author: admin
title: Tokyo Seeks Talks With North Korea Amid Concern About Japanese Abductees
text:
Home / NEWS / Tokyo Seeks Talks With North Korea Amid Concern About Japanese Abductees Tokyo Seeks Talks With North Korea Amid Concern About Japanese Abductees 2 hours ago NEWS , tokyo 
Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe said he hoped Tokyo could hold talks with North Korea, indicating concern that the issue of Japanese abducted by the North may get sidelined in the recent flurry of diplomacy. 
Mr. Abe made the comment in a call Friday with South Korean President Moon Jae-in, according to the South Korean side’s account. Japan’s foreign ministry didn’t have an immediate comment on the discussion.
